channel.title: Projects on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Home

item.title: 432 Broadway Dogecoin
item.description: Our approach centered on blending traditional aesthetics with modern lighting technology. We used advanced LED solutions to highlight the hotel’s grand architecture, ensuring that each area received its own thematic lighting that shifts with the mood and time of day. Ambient, task, and accent lighting techniques were employed to enhance both functionality and ambiance.
